name: vscode-gift-features
description: Additional support for Moodle's GIFT Format

giftLanguage.maxNumberOfProblems.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

giftLanguage.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
